Why Choose Our Light Boxes?

Energy Efficient

LED lighting ensures low power consumption and long-lasting performance.

Visibility

Bright, even illumination makes your message stand out day and night.

Customization

Fully customizable with your branding and message.

Frequently Asked Questions

Our LED lights are designed to last up to 50,000 hours of continuous use. This means they can run for over 5 years before needing replacement.
Yes, we offer professional installation services for all light boxes. Our team will handle everything from site preparation to final installation.
We accept AI, EPS, PDF, and high-resolution JPG/PNG files. For best results, please provide vector files (AI/EPS) with all text converted to outlines.

Technical Specifications

Standard Specifications:

  • Material: Acrylic (standard)
  • Thickness: 1/4"
  • Lighting: LED
  • Depth: 2"
  • Mounting: Required

File Requirements:

  • Format: AI, EPS, PDF, JPG, PNG
  • Resolution: 300 DPI minimum
  • Color Mode: CMYK
  • Bleed: 0.125" all sides
  • Fonts: Converted to outlines
